doc.title: Dental Hygiene with Sir Flossmore
doc.plot: Our 'Sir Flossmore' cartoon character rides in on his trusty steed, "Paste," to urge kids to start a lifelong habit of proper dental hygiene. In the fight against his mortal enemy, Plaque, Sir Flossmore demonstrates good dental hygiene habits in a fun way! He reviews the mechanics of brushing, gives a step-by-step tutorial on flossing, and reminds kids that their dentist is their last line of defense. In the end, Sir Flossmore rides off into the sunset, leaving behind bright, white smiles and healthy teeth.
